value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="${Properties#Log_ref}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest> <urn:cpsAuthorizationMessage> <urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> <urn2:agreementData> <urn3:agreementId>${Properties#AgreementId}</urn3:agreementId> <urn3:bankId>${Properties#bankId}</urn3:bankId> <urn3:customerID>${Properties#customerid}</urn3:customerID> <urn3:productID>${Properties#customerid}</urn3:productID> </urn2:agreementData> <urn2:userId>${Properties#UserID}</urn2:userId> <urn2:sessionID>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:sessionID> <urn2:firstName>Test</urn2:firstName> <urn2:lastName>Cust</urn2:lastName> <urn2:userAccount> <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:accountNumber> <urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:accountOwnerIdentifier> <urn2:currencyCode>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currencyCode> <urn2:accountType>${Properties#accountType}</urn2:accountType> <urn2:role>View</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Salary</urn2:role> <urn2:role>Transfer</urn2:role> <urn2:approvalLimit>${Properties#approvalLimit}</urn2:approvalLimit> <urn2:registerLimit>${Properties#registerLimit}</urn2:registerLimit> <urn2:numberOfVerifiers>${Properties#numberOfVerifiers}</urn2:numberOfVerifiers> <urn2:numberOfApprovers>${Properties#numberOfApprovers}</urn2:numberOfApprovers> <urn2:bookingLevel>${Properties#bookingLevel}</urn2:bookingLevel> </urn2:userAccount> </urn1:cpsUserAuthorizationData> con:config.con:query: update STO_AGREEMENT set END_DATE = '${Properties#EndDate}' where INTERNAL_ID = '${Properties#internalId}'
update STO_RECURRENCE set END_DATE = '${Properties#EndDate}' where FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID = '${Properties#internalId}'
select * from STOH_AGREEMENT SA , STOH_RECURRENCE SR where SA.INTERNAL_ID = SR.FK_AGREEMENT_INTERNAL_ID and SA.AGREEMENTID = '${Properties#soAgreementId}'
